department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
duration_in_months: So-called EMPTY quote (desired duration, one year)
full_summary:
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) solicitation for the procurement of fresh eggs. 

### Solicitation Details

| Category            | Value                                                                                                                    |
|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Publication Date** | 25 March, 2024                                                                                                             |
| **Closing Date**     | 10 April, 2024, 14:00:00 EST                                                                                                                                                         |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4479780469                                                                                                                  |
| **Reference Number** | WS4479780469-Doc4500145082                                                                                                    |

### Contract Details

| Category            | Value                                                                                                                    |
|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Procurement Category**    | Goods and Services (GD)                                                                                                    |
| **Procurement Method**     | Open Tendering (Competitive)                                                                                     |
| **Selection Criteria**     | Lowest Price (Price)                                                                                                         |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | No specific date advised                                                                                                   |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 30 April 2025                                                                                                             |
| **Regions of Delivery** | Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, and Newfoundland and Labrador (Canada)                                                          |

### Notice URL
*   You can find more information about this solicitation [here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19203147?extsite=MTkyMDMxNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Agencies Involved
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) (Canadian entity) 
*   End-user entities include: (i) the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), (ii) the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), and (iii) the Department of National Defence (DND) (Canadian end-users)
